Observed at: Creston 8:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning near midnight. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: A few rain showers mixed with wet flurries early in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
